body: LEAD: A 31-year-old Brooklyn man was arrested last night in the stabbing death of another man during a fight in the Crown Heights section of Brooklyn. body: LEAD: Two youths were wounded, one of them critically, in a shooting yesterday afternoon outside a popular roller skating rink in the Crown Heights section of Brooklyn, the police said.
